components/category/halo-category-toolba:
{{> components/common/breadcrumbs breadcrumbs=breadcrumbs}}
{{> components/category/sidebar}}
{{#if theme_settings.show_sidebar}}
{{lang 'common.show_sidebar'}}
{{/if}} {{#if category.products}}
{{> components/category/show-product limit=limit products_per_page=theme_settings.page_products_per_page}}
{{> components/products/filter sort=pagination.category.sort}}
{{/if}}
components/common/breadcrumbs:
{{#unless theme_settings.hide_breadcrumbs }} {{#each breadcrumbs}}
  1. {{name}}
    2. {{/each}} {{/unless}}
components/category/sidebar: {{#if category.faceted_search_enabled}} {{> components/faceted-search/index category}} {{else}} {{> components/category/shop-by-price shop_by_price=category.shop_by_price category_url=category.url}} {{#if shop_by_brand}} {{> components/halothemes/sidebar/side-shop-by-brand}} {{/if}} {{/if}}
components/faceted-search/index:
{{> components/faceted-search/selected-facets selected}} {{#if facets.length '>' 2}} {{lang 'search.faceted.browse-by'}} {{join (pluck facets 'title') ', ' limit=2}} & {{toLowerCase (lang 'search.faceted.more')}} {{else}} {{lang 'search.faceted.browse-by'}} {{join (pluck facets 'title') ', ' lastSeparator=' & '}} {{/if}} {{lang 'search.faceted.hide-filters'}} {{lang 'search.faceted.show-filters'}} {{#any facets visible=true}}
{{#each facets}} {{#if visible}} {{{dynamicComponent 'components/faceted-search/facets'}}} {{/if}} {{/each}}
{{/any}}
components/halothemes/sidebar/side-shop-:
{{#if theme_settings.shop_by_brand_visibility}}

{{lang 'brand.label'}}

    {{#each shop_by_brand}}
  • {{name}}
    • {{/each}}
  • {{lang 'common.view_all'}}
{{/if}}
components/faceted-search/facets/hierarc:
{{#each this}}
  • {{{sanitize title}}} {{#if ../show_product_counts}} {{#if count}} ({{count}}) {{/if}} {{/if}} {{#if children}} {{> components/faceted-search/facets/hierarchy-children children}} {{/if}}
    • {{/each}}
components/faceted-search/selected-facet:
{{lang 'search.faceted.selected.title'}}

{{#if items}}
    {{#each items}}
  • {{#if facet '===' 'rating'}} {{lang 'search.faceted.selected.rating-label' rating=title}} {{else}} {{{sanitize title}}} {{/if}}
    • {{/each}}
{{else}}

{{lang 'search.faceted.selected.no-filters'}}

{{/if}} {{#if remove_all_url}} {{lang 'search.faceted.selected.clear-all'}} {{/if}}
components/faceted-search/facets/range:
{{> components/faceted-search/faceted-search-navigation}}
{{#each current_selected_items}} {{/each}} {{#if this.sort}} {{/if}}
components/faceted-search/faceted-search: {{#if selected}} {{lang 'search.faceted.clear'}} {{/if}}
components/products/ratings: {{#for 1 5}} {{#if ../this.rating '>=' $index}} {{else}} {{/if}} {{/for}}
